Html: Is it possible to select a gallery item programmatically? I have a RibbonSplitButtonGallery which I populate with GalleryItemPropertySet objects using its ItemsSource property. When clicking on an item, the SelectedItem property gives me the correct 0-based item index, but assigning a value to SelectedItem seems to have no effect.

Never mind. It works fine. The problem was me trying to assign a value to SelectedItem inside the RibbonSplitButtonGallery's ExecuteEvent when fired due to a change to SelectedItem. Apparently that's not possible.
